m.match_schedule_id, m.start_time, m.duration, m.cost, m.writer, m.reg_date, m.content, m.stadium_name, m.stadium_type, m.stadium_address, m.stadium_x, m.stadium_y, m.stadium_parking, m.stadium_shower, m.match_type, m.home_team_id, m.away_team_id, date_add(m.start_time, interval m.duration hour) end_time

SELECT , , vs.type, vs.cancel_number, vs.is_first, vs.waiting, vs.friend_emp, vs.self_min_number, vs.self_max_number, vs.emp_due_date, vs.emp_min_number, vs.away_min_number, vs.away_due_date, vs.assign_cost, vs.emp_cost, vs.search_cost, t.emblem home_emblem, t.team_name home_team_name, t2.emblem away_emblem, t2.team_name away_team_name, tm.total_num FROM match_schedule m LEFT OUTER JOIN vote_match v ON m.match_schedule_id = v.match_schedule_id LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT team_id, count(team_member_id) total_num FROM team_member GROUP BY team_id ) tm ON v.team_id = tm.team_id LEFT OUTER JOIN vote_match_setting vs ON vs.vote_match_id = v.vote_match_id JOIN team t ON m.home_team_id = t.team_id LEFT OUTER JOIN team t2 ON m.away_team_id = t2.team_id

SELECT vr.vote_match_id, count(if(vr.team_member_id > 0, 1, null)) voted_num, count(if(vr.attendance > 0 and team_member_id > 0, 1, null)) attend_num, count(if(vr.attendance = 0 and team_member_id > 0, 1, null)) abscent_num, count(vr.email) friend_num FROM vote_match_result vr JOIN vote_match v ON vr.vote_match_id = v.vote_match_id

SELECT vr.vote_match_result_id, vr.vote_match_id, vr.attendance, vr.email friend_email, vr.team_member_id, tm.email member_email, tm.nick_name FROM vote_match_result vr JOIN vote_match v ON v.vote_match_id = vr.vote_match_id LEFT OUTER JOIN team_member tm ON vr.team_member_id = tm.team_member_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vote_match(memo, due_date, vote_status, vote_reg_date, writer, team_id, match_schedule_id) VALUES(#{memo}, #{dueDate}, 0, sysdate(), #{writer}, #{team.teamId}, #{matchSchedule.matchScheduleId})
mapper.select: SELECT vote_match_id FROM vote_match WHERE team_id = #{value} ORDER BY vote_match_id DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vote_match_setting(vote_match_id, type, cancel_number, is_first, waiting, friend_emp, self_min_number, self_max_number, emp_due_date, emp_min_number, away_min_number, away_due_date, assign_cost, emp_cost, search_cost) VALUES(#{voteMatchId}, #{type}, #{cancelNumber}, #{isFirst}, #{waiting}, #{friendEmp}, #{selfMinNumber}, #{selfMaxNumber}, #{empDueDate}, #{empMinNumber}, #{awayMinNumber}, #{awayDueDate}, #{assignCost}, #{empCost}, #{searchCost})

mapper.select: SELECT s.search_id FROM search s JOIN search_reservation sr ON s.search_id = sr.search_id WHERE s.match_schedule_id = #{matchScheduleId} AND sr.team_id_taker = #{takerTeamId}
mapper.update: UPDATE vote_match SET vote_match_id = #{voteMatchId}, team_id = #{team.teamId}, match_schedule_id = #{matchSchedule.matchScheduleId}, memo = #{memo}, due_date = #{dueDate}, vote_status = #{voteStatus}, vote_reg_date = #{voteRegDate}, writer = #{writer} WHERE vote_match_id = #{voteMatchId};
